items.name: Ext.ux.ajax.SimManager
defaultSimlet
items.text: The Ext.ux.ajax.Simlet instance to use for non-matching URL's. By default, this will return 404. Set this to null to use real Ajax calls for non-matching URL's.

items.name: defaultType
items.text: The default `type` to apply to generic Ext.ux.ajax.Simlet configuration objects. The default is 'basic'.

items.name: delay
items.text: The number of milliseconds to delay before delivering a response to an async request.

items.name: init
items.text: Initializes this singleton and applies configuration options.

items.name: config
items.text: An optional object with configuration properties to apply.

items.name: simlet
items.text: Either a Ext.ux.ajax.Simlet instance or config, an Array of such elements or an Object keyed by URL with values that are Ext.ux.ajax.Simlet instances or configs.

items.name: ready
items.text: True once this singleton has initialized and applied its Ajax hooks.
